body:
-----Original Message----- 
From: Marcus Better [mailto:marcus@better.se] 
Sent: maandag 12 april 2010 14:23 
To: debian-kde@lists.debian.org 
Subject: Re: Amarok's Issues 
 
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE----- 
Hash: SHA1 
 
Edson Marquezani Filho wrote: 
 
> I would like to know if people here have the same problems with Amarok 
> (Squeeze's version of it), as I do. I haven't looked for bugs filled 
> about it yet, but these issues have been annoying for time enough to 
> put me wondering if I'am the only who has been facing them. 
 
I've had other weird problems with the collection (like missing albums) 
after an upgrade of Amarok. This was due to database corruption, and the fix 
 
was to nuke the database (somewhere under ~/.kde). 
 
Cheers, 
 
Marcus 
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE----- 
Version: GnuPG v1.4.10 (GNU/Linux) 
 
iEYEARECAAYFAkvDEKQACgkQXjXn6TzcAQleVgCfe1FbgnBz+meuuveGGHaHwWmW 
YzUAoIgxPWIrzc+8FcrKwu42+jb6RHbN 
=Uo2C 
-----END PGP SIGNATURE----- 
 
I do run with an external MySQL database. 
 
Cheers, 
 
Robert
